name: dedlem0a
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(w0, wb(w1, wi(wi(w2, w0), wa(w1, w0))))

stmt.origin: bitrd(w0, w1, wi(wi(w2, w0), wa(w1, w0)), wa(w1, w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(w1, wi(wi(w2, w0), wa(w1, w0))))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, wa(w1, w0)))
-| wi(w0, wb(wa(w1, w0), wi(wi(w2, w0), wa(w1, w0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(w1, wi(wi(w2, w0), wa(w1, w0))))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, wa(w1, w0)))
-| wi(w0, wb(wa(w1, w0), wi(wi(w2, w0), wa(w1, w0))))

|- wi(w0, wb(w1, wi(wi(w2, w0), wa(w1, w0))))
-| wi(w0, wb(wa(w1, w0), wi(wi(w2, w0), wa(w1, w0))))

stmt.origin: jarri(w0, wb(wa(w1, w0), wi(wi(w2, w0), wa(w1, w0))), w2)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wa(w1, w0), wi(wi(w2, w0), wa(w1, w0))))
-| wi(wi(w2, w0), wb(wa(w1, w0), wi(wi(w2, w0), wa(w1, w0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(w1, wi(wi(w2, w0), wa(w1, w0))))
-| wi(wi(w2, w0), wb(wa(w1, w0), wi(wi(w2, w0), wa(w1, w0))))

body.origin: |- wi(wi(w2, w0), wb(wa(w1, w0), wi(wi(w2, w0), wa(w1, w0))))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(w0, wb(w1, wi(wi(w2, w0), wa(w1, w0))))

comment: Lemma for an alternate version of weak deduction theorem. (Contributed by NM, 2-Apr-1994.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 7-May-2011.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 4-Dec-2012.)
